Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To pick up an item on the ground, press
the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> when you're
near the item.
<PAGE>
After you have picked up <RED>10 or more
items</RED>, come and talk to me again.
<PAGE>
You can pick up anything you like. Just
make sure you get <RED>10 or more items</RED>.
Then things will look tidier here.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, let me tell you how to move
the camera.
<PAGE>
Move the <BLUE>+Control Pad left and right</BLUE>
to change the <RED>direction</RED> of the
camera.
<PAGE>
Move the <BLUE>+Control Pad up and down</BLUE>
to change the <RED>height</RED> of the camera.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Where are you going? Hurry and pick up
<RED>10 or more items</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
You haven't picked up many items yet...
You need <RED><MOJI0> more items</RED> to get to 10.
Go on, pick them up!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There, now it looks much tidier!
<PAGE>
You can find and pick up useful items
all the time. Make a habit of it.
<PAGE>
It may not look useful at first glance,
but pick it up anyway!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are <RED>10 levels</RED> of camera
height setting available.
<BLUE>Pushing up or down on the +Control Pad</BLUE>
will move the indicator bar so you can
get the height you want.

When the camera is positioned higher,
you can see further. Use different
heights for different parts of play.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll wait for you here. Go pick up some
items, please.
